info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 24 at 2:29PM MDT until March 24 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Junction has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Mesa County in west central Colorado... * Until 300 PM MDT. * At 228 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles south of Palisade, or 12 miles southeast of Grand Junction, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail and 40 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Mesa County, including the following locations... Whitewater. This includes U.S. Highway 50 in Colorado between mile markers 42 and 45. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
